origination.corpname: Bay de Noquet Lumber Company (Nahma, Mich.)

did.unittitle:
Bay de Noquet Lumber Company (Nahma, Mich.) records
1883-1926
did.abstract: Journals, 1883-1887 and 1890-1892, sales record, 1923-1926, and voucher distribution record, 1916-1919.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were the gift of Charles E. Good (donor no. 2907).

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Bay de Noquet Lumber Company (Nahma, Mich.) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Bay de Noquet Lumber Company was a lumbering company headquartered in Nahma, Delta County, Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The records of the company are financial in content and include journals, a cash book, a sales record book, and a record of voucher distribution. Most of the records date from the 1880s.
